data.eml:eml: Agelanius verai, a new species of horse fly from Chile (Diptera: Tabanidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article González, Christian R. (2004): Agelanius verai, a new species of horse fly from Chile (Diptera: Tabanidae). Zootaxa 571: 1-5, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157221
